definition: especially of leaves, (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
details:
adjective
- especially of leaves
= synonyms: cauline
- (used of opinions and actions) far beyond the norm
= synonyms: extremist, ultra
- markedly new or introducing radical change
= synonyms: revolutionary
- arising from or going to the root or source
= example: arising from or going to the root or source
- of or relating to or constituting a linguistic root
= example: of or relating to or constituting a linguistic root
noun
- (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
= synonyms: stem
- a character conveying the lexical meaning of a logogram
- a person who has radical ideas or opinions
- (mathematics) a quantity expressed as the root of another quantity
- (chemistry) two or more atoms bound together as a single unit and forming part of a molecule
= synonyms: group
- an atom or group of atoms with at least one unpaired electron
= synonyms: free radical
